TextView.android:text: You seem to be a new player! .

Can you guess the name of a song from the words: jumbo, lie, easy? How about: Wooo, heavy metal, checked, pleased? Your goal is to guess the name of a random song given a list of words in the song. Collect these words by moving to locations on a map. The more words you have, the easier it will be to guess the song. There are 5 different maps, (1-5 from easiest to hardest).
